message: Let's start with a fair deal, I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can negotiate further if you want, but time is money!
You took a bold start, but I'm not afraid of a 50/50 split. Let's see if we can do better than that!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still aiming for a better deal.  Let's try 60/40 this time. It's a compromise, but it reflects the value of our time.
You're pushing for a 60/40 split, but I'm not ready to give up that much. I'll meet you in the middle with a 55/45 split. It's a fair compromise, but I'm not getting any younger!
